card.name: Act of Treason
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Aerial Maneuver
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.

card.name: AEtherize
card.text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

card.name: Agoraphobia
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -5/-0. {2}{U}: Return Agoraphobia to its owner's hand.

card.name: Alms Beast
card.text: Creatures blocking or blocked by Alms Beast have lifelink.

card.name: Alpha Authority
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has hexproof and can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Angelic Edict
card.text: Exile target creature or enchantment.

card.name: Angelic Skirmisher
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each combat, choose first strike, vigilance, or lifelink. Creatures you control gain that ability until end of turn.

card.name: Armored Transport
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Armored Transport by creatures blocking it.

card.name: Arrows of Justice
card.text: Arrows of Justice deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Assemble the Legion
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on Assemble the Legion. Then put a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste onto the battlefield for each muster counter on Assemble the Legion.

card.name: Aurelia, the Warleader
card.text: Flying, vigilance, haste Whenever Aurelia, the Warleader attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Aurelia's Fury
card.text: Aurelia's Fury deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Tap each creature dealt damage this way. Players dealt damage this way can't cast noncreature spells this turn.

card.name: Balustrade Spy
card.text: Flying When Balustrade Spy enters the battlefield, target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Bane Alley Broker
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at cards exiled with Bane Alley Broker. {U}{B}, {T}: Return a card exiled with Bane Alley Broker to its owner's hand.

card.name: Beckon Apparition
card.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Put a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Biomass Mutation
card.text: Creatures you control become X/X until end of turn.

card.name: Bioshift
card.text: Move any number of +1/+1 counters from target creature onto another target creature with the same controller.

card.name: Biovisionary
card.text: At the beginning of the end step, if you control four or more creatures named Biovisionary, you win the game.

card.name: Blind Obedience
card.text: Extort Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Bomber Corps
card.text: Battalion - Whenever Bomber Corps and at least two other creatures attack, Bomber Corps deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Borborygmos Enraged
card.text: Trample Whenever Borborygmos Enraged deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Discard a land card: Borborygmos Enraged deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Boros Charm
card.text: Choose one - Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player; or permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn; or target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Boros Elite
card.text: Battalion - Whenever Boros Elite and at least two other creatures attack, Boros Elite gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Boros Guildgate
card.text: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Boros Keyrune
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. {R}{W}: Boros Keyrune becomes a 1/1 red and white Soldier artifact creature with double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Boros Reckoner
card.text: Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player. {RW}: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Breeding Pool
card.text: As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Breeding Pool enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
card.text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Burst of Strength
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and untap it.

card.name: Call of the Nightwing
card.text: Put a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Cipher

card.name: Cartel Aristocrat
card.text: Sacrifice another creature: Cartel Aristocrat gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Cinder Elemental
card.text: {X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: Cinder Elemental deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Clan Defiance
card.text: Choose one or more - Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature with flying; Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature without flying; and/or Clan Defiance deals X damage to target player.

card.name: Coerced Confession
card.text: Target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. You draw a card for each creature card put into that graveyard this way.

card.name: Consuming Aberration
card.text: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards. Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Contaminated Ground
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Swamp. Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Corpse Blockade
card.text: Defender Sacrifice another creature: Corpse Blockade gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Court Street Denizen
card.text: Whenever another white creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Crackling Perimeter
card.text: Tap an untapped Gate you control: Crackling Perimeter deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Crowned Ceratok
card.text: Trample Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

card.name: Crypt Ghast
card.text: Extort Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Daring Skyjek
card.text: Battalion - Whenever Daring Skyjek and at least two other creatures attack, Daring Skyjek gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Deathcult Rogue
card.text: Deathcult Rogue can't be blocked except by Rogues.

card.name: Deathpact Angel
card.text: Flying When Deathpact Angel dies, put a 1/1 white and black Cleric creature token onto the battlefield. It has "{3}{W}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return a card named Deathpact Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield."

card.name: Death's Approach
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.

card.name: Debtor's Pulpit
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Tap target creature."

card.name: Devour Flesh
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature, then gains life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Diluvian Primordial
card.text: Flying When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a card cast this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Dimir Charm
card.text: Choose one - Counter target sorcery spell; or destroy target creature with power 2 or less; or look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.

card.name: Dimir Guildgate
card.text: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Dimir Keyrune
card.text: {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. {U}{B}: Dimir Keyrune becomes a 2/2 blue and black Horror artifact creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Dinrova Horror
card.text: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

card.name: Disciple of the Old Ways
card.text: {R}: Disciple of the Old Ways gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Domri Rade
card.text: +1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. -2: Target creature you control fights another target creature. -7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."

card.name: Drakewing Krasis
card.text: Flying, trample

card.name: Duskmantle Guildmage
card.text: {1}{U}{B}: Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere this turn, that player loses 1 life. {2}{U}{B}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Duskmantle Seer
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of his or her library, loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost, then puts it into his or her hand.

card.name: Dutiful Thrull
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Dutiful Thrull.

card.name: Dying Wish
card.text: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature dies, target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is its power.

card.name: Elusive Krasis
card.text: Elusive Krasis can't be blocked. Evolve

card.name: Ember Beast
card.text: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.

card.name: Enter the Infinite
card.text: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

card.name: Executioner's Swing
card.text: Target creature that dealt damage this turn gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

card.name: Experiment One
card.text: Evolve Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One.

card.name: Fathom Mage
card.text: Evolve Whenever a +1/+1 counter is placed on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

card.name: Firefist Striker
card.text: Battalion - Whenever Firefist Striker and at least two other creatures attack, target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Firemane Avenger
card.text: Flying Battalion - Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Five-Alarm Fire
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, put a blaze counter on Five-Alarm Fire. Remove five blaze counters from Five-Alarm Fire: Five-Alarm Fire deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Forced Adaptation
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

card.name: Fortress Cyclops
card.text: Whenever Fortress Cyclops attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Fortress Cyclops blocks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Foundry Champion
card.text: When Foundry Champion enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of creatures you control. {R}: Foundry Champion gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {W}: Foundry Champion gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Foundry Street Denizen
card.text: Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Frenzied Tilling
card.text: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Frilled Oculus
card.text: {1}{G}: Frilled Oculus gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Frontline Medic
card.text: Battalion - Whenever Frontline Medic and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. Sacrifice Frontline Medic: Counter target spell with {X} in its mana cost unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Furious Resistance
card.text: Target blocking creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Gateway Shade
card.text: {B}: Gateway Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Tap an untapped Gate you control: Gateway Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
card.text: Trample Bloodrush - {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Giant Adephage
card.text: Trample Whenever Giant Adephage deals combat damage to a player, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of Giant Adephage.

card.name: Gideon, Champion of Justice
card.text: +1: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls. 0: Until end of turn, Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes a Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him and gains indestructible. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. -15: Exile all other permanents.

card.name: Gift of Orzhova
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.

card.name: Glaring Spotlight
card.text: Creatures your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof. {3}, Sacrifice Glaring Spotlight: Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Godless Shrine
card.text: As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Godless Shrine enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Gridlock
card.text: Tap X target nonland permanents.

card.name: Grisly Spectacle
card.text: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Ground Assault
card.text: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

card.name: Gruul Charm
card.text: Choose one - Creatures without flying can't block this turn; or gain control of all permanents you own; or Gruul Charm deals 3 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Gruul Guildgate
card.text: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Gruul Keyrune
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. {R}{G}: Gruul Keyrune becomes a 3/2 red and green Beast artifact creature with trample until end of turn.

card.name: Gruul Ragebeast
card.text: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Guardian of the Gateless
card.text: Flying Guardian of the Gateless can block any number of creatures. Whenever Guardian of the Gateless blocks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature it's blocking.

card.name: Guildscorn Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from multicolored.

card.name: Gyre Sage
card.text: Evolve {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each +1/+1 counter on Gyre Sage.

card.name: Hands of Binding
card.text: Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Cipher

card.name: Hellkite Tyrant
card.text: Flying, trample Whenever Hellkite Tyrant deals combat damage to a player, gain control of all artifacts that player controls. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more artifacts, you win the game.

card.name: Hellraiser Goblin
card.text: Creatures you control have haste and attack each combat if able.

card.name: High Priest of Penance
card.text: Whenever High Priest of Penance is dealt damage, you may destroy target nonland permanent.

card.name: Hindervines
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with no +1/+1 counters on them.

card.name: Hold the Gates
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 for each Gate you control and have vigilance.

card.name: Holy Mantle
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from creatures.

card.name: Homing Lightning
card.text: Homing Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature and each other creature with the same name as that creature.

card.name: Horror of the Dim
card.text: {U}: Horror of the Dim gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Hydroform
card.text: Target land becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Illness in the Ranks
card.text: Creature tokens get -1/-1.

card.name: Illusionist's Bracers
card.text: Whenever an ability of equipped creature is activated, if it isn't a mana ability, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. Equip {3}

card.name: Immortal Servitude
card.text: Return each creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Incursion Specialist
card.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Incursion Specialist gets +2/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Ivy Lane Denizen
card.text: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Keymaster Rogue
card.text: Keymaster Rogue can't be blocked. When Keymaster Rogue enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Killing Glare
card.text: Destroy target creature with power X or less.

card.name: Knight Watch
card.text: Put two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance onto the battlefield.

card.name: Last Thoughts
card.text: Draw a card. Cipher

card.name: Lazav, Dimir Mastermind
card.text: Hexproof Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may have Lazav, Dimir Mastermind become a copy of that card except its name is still Lazav, Dimir Mastermind, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it gains hexproof and this ability.

card.name: Legion Loyalist
card.text: Haste Battalion - Whenever Legion Loyalist and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain first strike and trample until end of turn and can't be blocked by creature tokens this turn.

card.name: Leyline Phantom
card.text: When Leyline Phantom deals combat damage, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Lord of the Void
card.text: Flying Whenever Lord of the Void deals combat damage to a player, exile the top seven cards of that player's library, then put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Luminate Primordial
card.text: Vigilance When Luminate Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target creature that player controls and that player gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Madcap Skills
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Mark for Death
card.text: Target creature an opponent controls blocks this turn if able. Untap that creature. Other creatures that player controls can't block this turn.

card.name: Martial Glory
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Massive Raid
card.text: Massive Raid deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Master Biomancer
card.text: Each other creature you control enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to Master Biomancer's power and as a Mutant in addition to its other types.

card.name: Mental Vapors
card.text: Target player discards a card. Cipher

card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Cipher

card.text: Put an X/X green Ooze creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Mind Grind
card.text: Each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals X land cards, then puts all cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard. X can't be 0.

card.name: Mindeye Drake

card.name: Molten Primordial
card.text: Haste When Molten Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature that player controls until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Mortus Strider
card.text: When Mortus Strider dies, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mugging
card.text: Mugging deals 2 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Simic Keyrune
card.text: {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. {G}{U}: Simic Keyrune becomes a 2/3 green and blue Crab artifact creature with hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Simic Manipulator
card.text: Evolve {T}, Remove one or more +1/+1 counters from Simic Manipulator: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of +1/+1 counters removed this way.

card.name: Skarrg Goliath
card.text: Trample Bloodrush - {5}{G}{G}, Discard Skarrg Goliath: Target attacking creature gets +9/+9 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Skarrg Guildmage
card.text: {R}{G}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. {1}{R}{G}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Skinbrand Goblin
card.text: Bloodrush - {R}, Discard Skinbrand Goblin: Target attacking creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Skullcrack
card.text: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn. Skullcrack deals 3 damage to target player.

card.name: Skyblinder Staff
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked by creatures with flying. Equip {3}

card.name: Skygames
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery."

card.name: Skyknight Legionnaire
card.text: Flying, haste

card.name: Slate Street Ruffian
card.text: Whenever Slate Street Ruffian becomes blocked, defending player discards a card.

card.name: Slaughterhorn
card.text: Bloodrush - {G}, Discard Slaughterhorn: Target attacking creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Smite
card.text: Destroy target blocked creature.

card.name: Smog Elemental
card.text: Flying Creatures with flying your opponents control get -1/-1.

card.name: Soul Ransom
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only any opponent may activate this ability.

card.name: Spark Trooper
card.text: Trample, lifelink, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Trooper.

card.name: Spell Rupture
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Spire Tracer
card.text: Spire Tracer can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

card.name: Stolen Identity
card.text: Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of target artifact or creature. Cipher

card.name: Stomping Ground
card.text: As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Stomping Ground enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Structural Collapse
card.text: Target player sacrifices an artifact and a land. Structural Collapse deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Sunhome Guildmage
card.text: {1}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. {2}{R}{W}: Put a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste onto the battlefield.

card.name: Sylvan Primordial
card.text: Reach When Sylvan Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, destroy target noncreature permanent that player controls. For each permanent destroyed this way, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Thespian's Stage
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land and gains this ability.

card.name: Thrull Parasite
card.text: Extort {T}, Pay 2 life: Remove a counter from target nonland permanent.

card.name: Tin Street Market
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."

card.name: Totally Lost
card.text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Tower Defense
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+5 and gain reach until end of turn.

card.name: Towering Thunderfist
card.text: {W}: Towering Thunderfist gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Treasury Thrull
card.text: Extort Whenever Treasury Thrull attacks, you may return target artifact, creature, or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Truefire Paladin
card.text: Vigilance {R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Undercity Informer
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Undercity Plague
card.text: Target player loses 1 life, discards a card, then sacrifices a permanent. Cipher

card.name: Unexpected Results
card.text: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield and return Unexpected Results to its owner's hand.

card.name: Urban Evolution
card.text: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

card.name: Urbis Protector
card.text: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Verdant Haven
card.text: Enchant land When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Viashino Shanktail
card.text: First strike Bloodrush - {2}{R}, Discard Viashino Shanktail: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Vizkopa Confessor
card.text: Extort When Vizkopa Confessor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. Target opponent reveals that many cards from his or her hand. You choose one of them and exile it.

card.name: Vizkopa Guildmage
card.text: {1}{W}{B}: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn. {1}{W}{B}: Whenever you gain life this turn, each opponent loses that much life.

card.name: Voidwalk
card.text: Exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Cipher

card.name: Warmind Infantry
card.text: Battalion - Whenever Warmind Infantry and at least two other creatures attack, Warmind Infantry gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wasteland Viper
card.text: Deathtouch Bloodrush - {G}, Discard Wasteland Viper: Target attacking creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Watery Grave
card.text: As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Way of the Thief
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature can't be blocked as long as you control a Gate.

card.name: Whispering Madness
card.text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way. Cipher

card.name: Wight of Precinct Six
card.text: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.

card.name: Wildwood Rebirth
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Wojek Halberdiers
card.text: Battalion - Whenever Wojek Halberdiers and at least two other creatures attack, Wojek Halberdiers gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Wrecking Ogre
card.text: Double strike Bloodrush - {3}{R}{R}, Discard Wrecking Ogre: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 and gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Zameck Guildmage
card.text: {G}{U}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {G}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

card.name: Zarichi Tiger
card.text: {1}{W}, {T}: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Zhur-Taa Swine
card.text: Bloodrush - {1}{R}{G}, Discard Zhur-Taa Swine: Target attacking creature gets +5/+4 until end of turn.
